ja444:9.2: eḷamūgova bālo → eḷamūgo capalo (s2, s3, mr) | elamūgo va bālo (pts1)
ja444:9.5: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ → viññūpasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | viññūpasatthaṃ vasitaṃ ca ṭhānaṃ (mr)
ja444:11.4: antimagandhano → gandhino (bj, s2, s3, pts1, mr)
ja444:13.6: paddhacarāmhi → baddhacarāsmi (bj) | paṭṭhacarāmi (s2, s3) | baddhacarāmi (pts1) | paṭṭhacarāmhi (mr)
ja444:14.1: bhāsiṃ yamabhāsaneyyaṃ → bhāsissaṃ abhāsaneyyaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | bhāsissa'mabhāsaneyyaṃ (?)
